RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStats.summary:
The RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStats dictionary of the WebRTC API is used to report statistics from the remote endpoint about a particular incoming RTP stream.
These will correspond to an outgoing RTP stream at the local end of the .

remarks.para: The statistics can be obtained by iterating the returned by or until you find a report with the type of remote-inbound-rtp.
